definitions.definition: Financial means; a means of maintaining life; livelihood
examples: What do you do for a living ?
The National Brewing Company declared that the Chesapeake Bay region was the Land of Pleasant Living .

definitions.definition: Those who are alive: living people.
examples: in the land of the living
Glad to see you're still among the living ! [good-humored greeting]
Some say that the spirits of the departed walk among the living , though most of us do not see them.

definitions.definition: A position in a church (usually the Church of England) that has attached to it a source of income; an ecclesiastical benefice .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The state of being alive .
secondary_definitions: Financial means; a means of maintaining life; livelihood
( with "the" ) Those who are alive: living people.
( canon law ) A position in a church (usually the Church of England) that has attached to it a source of income; an ecclesiastical benefice .
